intro:
In this 1-bit rogue-like adventure you shoot first!
But then a swarm of enemies will shoot back!
Prepare to block them at the right moment!
description:
Guide this squishy hero through enemy hordes in a turn-based roguelike shooter. Your strategy and quick reflexes are crucial!
Every turn of every battle tests your skills. Plan ahead, shoot with precision and prepare to block the incoming enemy attacks!
As you push forward, the challenge intensifies, making each victory your best achievement!

■ What can this little dude do?
· Arm this guy with a different arsenal in each attempt!
· Try all the weapons! There are more than 30 unique weapons, from pistols to sunbeams, guillotines, and even bees!
· Open shiny treasures and expand your gear!
· Visit the shop to buy upgrades and items with your hard-earned money!
· Conquer the 4 unique worlds! Each filled with distinct and dangerous foes!
... and face off against the mysterious final boss... if you can get there.

■ What follows?
· Use your points to unlock vibrant new palettes with each run!
· Don't like the prices of the shop? Fight the shopkeeper if you're feeling feisty! But deal with the consequences!

■ Wait, so... How does Gun Rounds work?
In Gun Rounds the basics are: you shoot the enemies, the enemies shoot back at you, you block their attacks, and then you shoot them again!
You start with two weapons at random. No two runs are the same.
Weapons need bullets. You can reload in your turn with a drawback: reloading makes your blocking radius smaller. You also get one bullet for each enemy attack you block.
Blocking attacks is crucial. You can stop their attacks when the projectiles are inside your blocking radius. Act carefully!
You obtain new weapons from chests that appear in the levels. Having a maximum of 4 at the same time.
With each enemy you defeat you earn coins.
At the end of each world, you can visit the shop to purchase upgrades and special items with the coins you got in this run. There are some freebies too.
When you die (you will die), the remaining coins will be used to unlock new palettes!

Good luck!
